1.0.name: wordpress/facebook-status-email-updater
1.0.description:
This plugin uses a post's URL permalink or shortlink to post to Facebook, where a large variety of services can further share the post if needed.

If you want to find a good shortlink service, my advice is the getJetpack. It provides users of WordPress 3.0 with wp.me shortlinks, which will last as long as WordPress.com is around.

This plugin was originally inspired by FaceBook Status Updater via email

Instructions on how to use the plugin are included on the options page. If you need help, you can ask in the forums, or comment on the plugin's home page.

NOTE: This doesn't need to send an email to Facebook. It could technically be used to send an email to anyone or anything.
